list.abs: its droll tone and tricksy style almost mask its heroine ’ s solitude and tristesse .它滑稽的语调和恶作剧的风格几乎掩盖了女主角的孤僻和忧郁。

auth_sentence.content: Tegan and Sara are a tricksy proposition, identical twin songwriters who write far from identical music.
